txt.en: Sterkist can be found at the Beorninghús.\n\nYou should bring the mushrooms to Sterkist.
Mushrooms can be found north of the Beorninghús.\n\nYou should gather mushrooms for Sterkist.

'Gírta has tasked me with collecting wild mushrooms from the Beorning-lands. They grow in the small groves throughout the vale, but now that I give it a little more thought, I realize that these mushrooms can be found quite far from the Beorninghús! I would not want to encounter a warg, or worse! Perhaps you could help me collect some of the mushrooms that are further afield?'

#-1:[placeholder]', Gírta has tasked me with collecting wild mushrooms from the Beorning-lands. They grow in the small groves throughout the vale, but now that I give it a little more thought, I realize that these mushrooms can be found quite far from the Beorninghús! I would not want to encounter a warg, or worse! #-1:{Sister[f]|Brother}, perhaps you could help me collect some of the mushrooms that are further afield?'
Sterkist has been tasked with collecting mushrooms, only to realize that the mushrooms he seeks might lead him a little further astray than he would like.
'Great work! This should be enough mushrooms for the stew that Gírta is preparing. I shall bring the mushrooms to her. You have been most helpful!'
That badger is not very happy about you taking that mushroom!
